content.raw:
This should be ready for review! The only questions are:

1. What should the fake model names be? “No Model” or “\_”?
2. Is `enable_ros_network` the right variable name? How it is used now, we could even change it to `non_competition_setup` or similar
3. I get a strange output when I run `source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh` then 

➜  vrx\_gazebo roslaunch vrx\_gazebo ......find: File system loop detected; ‘/home/tylerlum/vrx\_ws/src/vrx/vrx\_gazebo/models/vrx\_gazebo/models’ is part of the same file system loop as ‘/home/tylerlum/vrx\_ws/src/vrx/vrx\_gazebo/models’.

If I write `roslaunch vrx_gazebo ` then TAB, then I get this output.

Otherwise, it is working very reliably for me.

**Instructions:**

1. `source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh` then `roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch verbose:=true` \(runs regular, should be identical to before\)
2. `source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh` then `roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch verbose:=true enable_ros_network:=false` \(runs diff spawn model node, should ACT identical to before\)

How does it look? Also, view the fake models in Insert
content.html:
This should be ready for review! The only questions are:

  1. What should the fake model names be? “No Model” or “_”?
  2. Is enable_ros_network the right variable name? How it is used now, we could even change it to non_competition_setup or similar
  3. I get a strange output when I run source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh then

➜ vrx_gazebo roslaunch vrx_gazebo ......find: File system loop detected; ‘/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models/vrx_gazebo/models’ is part of the same file system loop as ‘/home/tylerlum/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/models’.

If I write roslaunch vrx_gazebo then TAB, then I get this output.

Otherwise, it is working very reliably for me.

Instructions:

  1. source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh then roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch verbose:=true (runs regular, should be identical to before)
  2. source ~/vrx_ws/devel/setup.zsh then roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch verbose:=true enable_ros_network:=false (runs diff spawn model node, should ACT identical to before)

How does it look? Also, view the fake models in Insert
